data.text: @kross334 @Ringo6 @ChrisVanHollen This isn’t about pretending past presidents were saints. It’s about recognizing context. Personal misconduct, bad policy, or institutional abuse are serious & they were debated, investigated, judged on their own terms. None of that makes racialized imagery suddenly “irrelevant.”

@ICURUOK1 @Ringo6 @ChrisVanHollen Oh yes yes the old sanctity of the office reason. The left was so concerned about that sanctity when we had Presidents coercing interns, inserting themselves against local law enforcement, weaponizing our institutions or had no clue what kind of policies were being done under

@ChrisVanHollen Denounce the anti-ICE protesters in Minnesota.  

They've been racially abusing non-white ICE agents, up to and including using the N-word against them.

@ChrisVanHollen Everyone knows what you're doing here senator, you're pushing division hatred and fear mongering among the masses! You said and have margaritas with felons! You don't do what's best for america! The rest of us are trying to get along and move along.
@ChrisVanHollen Look retard, it was attached at the end of the video, and he did not create it.
